title: Untamed: A short story shapeshifter fantasy romance
description: My sustained abstinence of blood was dragging me by the balls; but there’s no shortage of unwilling blood donors.I hadn’t expected to see her in a poorly lit alley, nor did I expect her to hold her own against a wannabe thief; my dinner.Badass. Who was she?I felt how bad I wanted her as soon as I walked into the store.I didn’t have to go undercover to find her, I just followed her scent.Her pull is intoxicating and I know my family is getting suspicious.She is a welcome distraction from my immortal life of blood lust.Never in all my years on this earth have I met someone like her before.I know someone will eventually track her down and bury her.Until she does the unthinkable..*A Paranormal short story romance with HEA*
author: E.L.  Jones
